Hash.Item: onclick="ITSM.Agent.ConfigItem.Search.OpenSearchDialog('AgentITSMConfigItemSearch'); if (event.stopPropagation) { event.stopPropagation(); } else { window.event.cancelBubble = true; } return false;"

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###000-Back
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to go back in the configuration item zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###200-History
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to access the history of a configuration item in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###300-Edit
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to edit a configuration item in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###400-Print
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to print a configuration item in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###500-Link
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows linking a configuration item with another object in the config item zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###600-Duplicate
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to duplicate a configuration item in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###700-ConfigItemDelete
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to delete a configuration item in its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: LinkObject::ComplexTable::SettingsVisibility###ITSMConfigItem
Setting.Description: Define Actions where a settings button is available in the linked objects widget (LinkObject::ViewMode = "complex"). Please note that these Actions must have registered the following JS and CSS files: Core.AllocationList.css, Core.UI.AllocationList.js, Core.UI.Table.Sort.js, Core.Agent.TableFilters.js and Core.Agent.LinkObject.js.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::NumberGenerator
Setting.Description: Selects the configuration item number generator module. "AutoIncrement" increments the configuration item number, the SystemID, the ConfigItemClassID and the counter are used. The format is "SystemID.ConfigItemClassID.Counter", e.g. 1205000004, 1205000005.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::CINameRegex
Setting.Description: Defines regular expressions individually for each ConfigItem class to check the ConfigItem name and to show corresponding error messages.

Hash.Item: A computer name must start with ABC!
A hardware name must end with two digits!

Setting.Name: LinkObject::DefaultSubObject###ITSMConfigItem
Setting.Description: Defines the default subobject of the class 'ITSMConfigItem'.

Setting.Name: LinkObject::ITSMConfigItem::ShowColumns
Setting.Description: Defines the shown columns of CIs in the link table complex view for all CI classes. If there is no entry, then the default columns are shown.

Setting.Name: LinkObject::ITSMConfigItem::ShowColumnsByClass
Setting.Description: Defines the shown columns of CIs in the link table complex view, depending on the CI class. Each entry must be prefixed with the class name and double colons (i.e. Computer::). There are a few CI-Attributes that common to all CIs (example for the class Computer: Computer::Name, Computer::CurDeplState, Computer::CreateTime). To show individual CI-Attributes as defined in the CI-Definition, the following scheme must be used (example for the class Computer): Computer::HardDisk::1, Computer::HardDisk::1::Capacity::1, Computer::HardDisk::2, Computer::HardDisk::2::Capacity::1. If there is no entry for a CI class, then the default columns are shown.

Setting.Name: Stats::DynamicObjectRegistration###ITSMConfigItem
Setting.Description: Module to generate ITSM config item statistics.

Setting.Name: ImportExport::ObjectBackendRegistration###ITSMConfigItem
Setting.Description: Object backend module registration for the import/export module.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::EventModulePost###100-History
Setting.Description: Config item event module that enables logging to history in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::HistoryOrder
Setting.Description: Shows the config item history (reverse ordered) in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentITSMConfigItemHistory
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::AgentITSMConfigItemHistory###003-ITSMConfigItem
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Description: Parameters for the deployment states in the preferences view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: GeneralCatalogPreferences###DeploymentStatesColors
Setting.Description: Parameters for the deployment states color in the preferences view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Permission::Class###010-ClassGroupCheck
Setting.Description: Module to check the group responsible for a class.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Permission::Item###010-ItemClassGroupCheck
Setting.Description: Module to check the group responsible for a configuration item.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the ITSM configuration item screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemEdit###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the edit ITSM configuration item screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemAdd###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the add ITSM configuration item screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemHistory###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the history ITSM configuration item screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemPrint###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the print ITSM configuration item screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemDelete###Permission
Setting.Description: Required privileges to delete config items.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemZoom###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the ITSM configuration item zoom screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the ITSM configuration item search screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AdminITSMConfigItem###EditorRows
Setting.Description: Defines the number of rows for the CI definition editor in the admin interface.

Setting.Name: GeneralCatalogPreferences###Permissions
Setting.Description: Parameters for the example permission groups of the general catalog attributes.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Search###ConfigItem
Setting.Description: Configuration item search backend router of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Search::JavaScript###ConfigItem
Setting.Description: JavaScript function for the search frontend.

Setting.Name: Loader::Agent::CommonJS###100-ConfigurationManagement
Setting.Description: List of JS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: PreferencesGroups###ConfigItemOverviewSmallPageShown
Setting.Description: Parameters for the pages (in which the configuration items are shown).

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::Overview###Small
Setting.Description: Defines an overview module to show the small view of a configuration item list.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Hook
Setting.Description: The identifier for a configuration item, e.g. ConfigItem#, MyConfigItem#. The default is ConfigItem#.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###SearchLimit
Setting.Description: Defines the search limit for the AgentITSMConfigItemSearch screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###ShowColumns
Setting.Description: Defines the shown columns in the config item search. This option has no effect on the position of the column.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###ShowColumnsByClass
Setting.Description: Defines the shown columns of CIs in the config item search depending on the CI class. Each entry must be prefixed with the class name and double colons (i.e. Computer::). There are a few CI-Attributes that are common to all CIs (example for the class Computer: Computer::Name, Computer::CurDeplState, Computer::CreateTime). To show individual CI-Attributes as defined in the CI-Definition, the following scheme must be used (example for the class Computer): Computer::HardDisk::1, Computer::HardDisk::1::Capacity::1, Computer::HardDisk::2, Computer::HardDisk::2::Capacity::1. If there is no entry for a CI class, then the default columns are shown as defined in the setting ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###ShowColumns.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###SearchCSVData
Setting.Description: Data used to export the search result in CSV format.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###SearchLimit
Setting.Description: Defines the search limit for the AgentITSMConfigItem screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###ShowColumns
Setting.Description: Defines the shown columns in the config item overview. This option has no effect on the position of the column. Note: Class column is always available if filter 'All' is selected.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###ShowColumnsByClass
Setting.Description: Defines the shown columns of CIs in the config item overview depending on the CI class. Each entry must be prefixed with the class name and double colons (i.e. Computer::). There are a few CI-Attributes that are common to all CIs (example for the class Computer: Computer::Name, Computer::CurDeplState, Computer::CreateTime). To show individual CI-Attributes as defined in the CI-Definition, the following scheme must be used (example for the class Computer): Computer::HardDisk::1, Computer::HardDisk::1::Capacity::1, Computer::HardDisk::2, Computer::HardDisk::2::Capacity::1. If there is no entry for a CI class, then the default columns are shown as defined in the setting ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###ShowColumns.

Setting.Name: UniqueCIName::EnableUniquenessCheck
Setting.Description: Enables/disables the functionality to check ConfigItems for unique names. Before enabling this option you should check your system for already existing config items with duplicate names. You can do this with the script bin/otrs.Console.pl Admin::ITSM::Configitem::ListDuplicates.

Setting.Name: UniqueCIName::UniquenessCheckScope
Setting.Description: Check for a unique name only within the same ConfigItem class ('class') or globally ('global'), which means every existing ConfigItem is taken into account when looking for duplicates.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::BulkFeature
Setting.Description: Enables configuration item bulk action feature for the agent frontend to work on more than one configuration item at a time.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::BulkFeatureGroup
Setting.Description: Enables configuration item bulk action feature only for the listed groups.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentITSMConfigItemBulk
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Navigation###AgentITSMConfigItemBulk###003-ITSMConfigItem
Setting.Description: Main menu item registration.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::PreMenuModule###100-Zoom
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to zoom into a configuration item in the configuration item overview of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::PreMenuModule###200-History
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to access the history of a configuration item in the configuration item overview of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::PreMenuModule###300-Duplicate
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to duplicate a configuration item in the configuration item overview of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemBulk###DeplState
Setting.Description: Sets the deployment state in the configuration item bulk screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemBulk###InciState
Setting.Description: Sets the incident state in the configuration item bulk screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::AdminModuleGroups###200-ITSMConfigurationManagement
Setting.Description: Defines available groups for the admin overview screen.

Setting.Name: AgentCustomerInformationCenter::Backend###0060-CIC-ITSMConfigItemCustomerCompany
Setting.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the customer company config item overview of the agent interface . "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Agent::CustomerInformationCenter::ITSMConfigItem###ShowColumnsByClass
Setting.Description: Defines the shown columns of CIs in the config item widget depending on the CI class. Each entry must be prefixed with the class name and double colons (i.e. Computer::). There are a few CI-Attributes that are common to all CIs (example for the class Computer: Computer::Name, Computer::CurDeplState, Computer::CreateTime). To show individual CI-Attributes as defined in the CI-Definition, the following scheme must be used (example for the class Computer): Computer::HardDisk::1, Computer::HardDisk::1::Capacity::1, Computer::HardDisk::2, Computer::HardDisk::2::Capacity::1. If there is no entry for a CI class, then the default columns are shown as defined in the setting AgentCustomerInformationCenter::Backend###0060-CIC-ITSMConfigItemCustomerCompany (key DefaultColumns).

Setting.Name: AgentCustomerUserInformationCenter::Backend###0060-CUIC-ITSMConfigItemCustomerUser
Setting.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the customer company config item overview of the agent interface . "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Agent::CustomerUserInformationCenter::ITSMConfigItem###ShowColumnsByClass
Setting.Description: Defines the shown columns of CIs in the config item widget depending on the CI class. Each entry must be prefixed with the class name and double colons (i.e. Computer::). There are a few CI-Attributes that are common to all CIs (example for the class Computer: Computer::Name, Computer::CurDeplState, Computer::CreateTime). To show individual CI-Attributes as defined in the CI-Definition, the following scheme must be used (example for the class Computer): Computer::HardDisk::1, Computer::HardDisk::1::Capacity::1, Computer::HardDisk::2, Computer::HardDisk::2::Capacity::1. If there is no entry for a CI class, then the default columns are shown as defined in the setting AgentCustomerInformationCenter::Backend###0060-CIC-ITSMConfigItemCustomerCompany (key DefaultColumns).

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::SetIncidentStateOnLink
Setting.Description: Set the incident state of a CI automatically when a Ticket is Linked to a CI.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::EventModulePost###042-ITSMConfigItemTicketStatusLink
Setting.Description: Event module to set configitem-status on ticket-configitem-link.

Setting.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###042-ITSMConfigItemTicketStatusLink
Setting.Description: Event module to set configitem-status on ticket-configitem-link.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::LinkStatus::TicketTypes
Setting.Description: Defines which type of ticket can affect the status of a linked CI.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::LinkStatus::DeploymentStates
Setting.Description: Defines the relevant deployment states where linked tickets can affect the status of a CI.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::LinkStatus::IncidentStates
Setting.Description: Defines the order of incident states from high (e.g. cricital) to low (e.g. functional).

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::LinkStatus::LinkTypes
Setting.Description: Defines which type of link (named from the ticket perspective) can affect the status of a linked CI.

Setting.Description: Registers a ITSMConfigItem-EventModule that will save related attachments.

Setting.Description: Limit for config item search.

Setting.Description: Enable search for config items based on the customer user id.

Setting.Description: Registers an output filter that shows a config item widget.

Setting.Description: Required group permissions to use the customer config item widget in the agent interface.

Setting.Description: Defines which type of link (named from the ticket perspective) is used to link tickets and config items.
